name: Tres Leches 'Three Milks'
author: Blanca
summary: It is a delicious cake with a special syrup on it, and a meringue frosting.  This cake requires refrigeration, and is served cold.
directions: Grease and flour a 8 x 12 inch pan
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Separate 5 eggs, and beat the egg whites in a large mixing bowl
Add 1 cup sugar slowly to the egg whites, beating constantly
Add the yolks one by one, beating well after each addition
Sift the flour, and stir it into the egg mixture
Pour the batter into the prepared pan
Bake the cake for 20 minutes, or until done
Blend the sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk, milk, and 1 tablespoon vanilla
Pour this syrup over the cooled cake
To make Meringue Frosting:  Beat 3 egg whites to soft peaks
Gradually add 1 cup sugar, and beat until stiff peaks form
